DOC.brief_summary: This multi-center , open-label study design examine effect long-term glucose control safety AC2993 patient type 2 diabetes treat metformin , sulfonylurea , metformin sulfonylurea combination .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Effect Glucose Control Safety AC2993 Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Treated With Metformin , Sulfonylurea , Metformin Sulfonylurea Combination
DOC.criteria: Subjects type 2 diabetes Treated least 3 month prior screen either metformin , sulfonylurea , metformin sulfonylurea combination BMI 2545 kg/m^2 HbA1c 7.5 % 12.0 % , inclusive Treated oral antidiabetic agent metformin sulfonylurea within 3 month screen Patients previously treat AC2993 Patients presently treat insulin
